name: The Vintage Face Depot
tagline: Update your look with our vast selection of vintage visages
body:
##Time for a change?

The Vintage Face Depot services all your face replacement needs. Our special [bot-powered fitting service](http://twitter.com/facedepot) automatically matches you with a face drawn from our large stock of vintage visages.

###Before
![Before](https://dl.dropbox.com/s/07cxlk0u7t1zm1m/before.jpg)

###After
![after](https://dl.dropbox.com/s/708mdkjz21rzwgz/after.jpg)

View more of our [successful face replacements](https://www.dropbox.com/sc/jew04kwv5ejwh9o/AADpP2l4tDx6r0BSZYNcoRSba).

##Automated fitting service

Simply tweet a photograph of yourself to [@facedepot](http://twitter.com/facedepot). Within minutes our bot will reply with an image of the new you. Marvel at the transformation!

To assist you in learning more about your new face, our bot includes a link to the newspaper article from which the replacement was obtained. Who will you been matched with? Twists and surprises await!

View a [sample tweet](https://twitter.com/facedepot/status/604806259712204800) below.

![Sample tweet](https://dl.dropbox.com/s/bqa779758akraw7/facetweet.png)

For best results your photograph should have an even contrast and your facial features should be visible.

##Our faces

Our vintage visages our extracted with care from the vast collection of digitised newspapers available through [Trove](http://trove.nla.gov.au). At the present moment we have almost 4,000 faces in stock, dating from 1880 to 1910. Many more will be added soon!

##Behind the scenes

The workings of our bot [are available](https://github.com/wragge/face-depot) for public scrutiny and reuse.

The story of our establishment and reception is [recounted here](https://storify.com/wragge/the-vintage-face-depot) for your enjoyment.

For those of a more reflective turn, some of the reasons for our creation are considered in [Unremembering the Forgotten](http://discontents.com.au/unremembering-the-forgotten/) and [The Perfect Face](http://discontents.com.au/the-perfect-face/).

Adventurous face builders are welcome to employ our [Face API](http://faceapi.herokuapp.com/) to develop their experiments.

The Vintage Face Depot was created by [Tim Sherratt](http://discontents.com.au) ([@wragge](http://twitter.com/wragge)).
